page.title: 01Rural Area N.E. of Baldock
page.content:
This block has about 0.5 sq.km. of N.E. Baldock in the S.W. corner, which is mainly residential, but with some commercial and industrial functions.
The remainder of the block is undulating chalk country, overlain by clays, and intensively farmed for arable crops.
Many people living in the block do not work there, but commute to nearby larger towns such as Stevenage or even to London.
This rural area is poorly served by bus services and there are few amenities of any sort, even in Baldock itself, the main part of which is just S.W. of the block.
